tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE returns_monitoring (
    return_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    return_date DATE,
    return_reason VARCHAR(255),
    return_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    processing_time INT
);

CREATE TABLE return_performance (
   performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   return_id INT,
   processing_time INT,
   processing_status VARCHAR(50),
   shipping_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE return_metrics (
   metrics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   return_id INT,
   return_quantity INT,
   restocking_time INT,
   restocking_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
